abstract: The Glacéau deal offered evidence that coming up with a new beverage, or putting a new twist on an old one, can be lucrative.
snippet: The Glacéau deal offered evidence that coming up with a new beverage, or putting a new twist on an old one, can be lucrative.
lead_paragraph: If you set up a lemonade stand this weekend, you might consider stirring in something a little different.

headline.main: Coke Takes $4 Billion Step Away From Carbonation
headline.print_headline: Coke Takes $4 Billion Step Away From Carbonation

abstract: The United States and China ended talks with unfinished business, as China took a $3 billion stake in the Blackstone Group.
snippet: The United States and China ended talks with unfinished business, as China took a $3 billion stake in the Blackstone Group.
lead_paragraph: THE United States and China ended talks with unfinished business, as China took a $3 billion stake in the Blackstone Group. The Tracinda Corporation of Kirk Kerkorian sought to buy two Las Vegas properties for an estimated $12 billion, and Coca-Cola moved to broaden its noncarbonated beverage portfolio with a $4.1 billion deal.

headline.main: China Makes a U.S. Deal, but It’s Not With Washington
headline.print_headline: China Makes a U.S. Deal, but It’s Not With Washington

abstract: The Coca-Cola Company announced today that it will buy Glaceau, the maker of Vitaminwater, for $4.2 billion in cash.
snippet: The Coca-Cola Company announced today that it will buy Glaceau, the maker of Vitaminwater, for $4.2 billion in cash.
lead_paragraph: The Coca-Cola Company announced today that it will buy Glaceau, the maker of Vitaminwater, for $4.2 billion in cash.

byline.original: By Andrew Ross Sorkin and Andrew Martin
